entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 05 January 2023
